entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is being comforted by his friends Ron and Hermione after receiving news.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and classmate at Hogwarts. He is trying to be supportive and comforting in this situation.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is Harry's other friend and classmate at Hogwarts. She is also trying to be supportive and comforting.

relationships.description: Harry, Ron, and Hermione are friends who are supporting each other in this situation.
